topic.title: How to Avoid Wrapping the Title Text Without Indentation

body.p: By default, the chapter/section number is on the same line as the title text. If the title is too long, the text wraps to the next line without any indentation.

p.codeblock: 4.5.5 This is a long title text that wraps.

body.p: If you want the wrapped text to include indentation, you need to set the value of the args.css.param.title.layout transformation parameter to table. This results in the chapter/section number being placed in one cell while the rest of the title content is in another cell with wrapped text and it is displayed with an indent:
